response.overview: A simple man, Durga, finds his ordinary life turned upside down when his politician brother is killed by a ruthless rival named Guru Narayan. Durga becomes an activist and a powerful union leader whose commitment to justice sometimes means disregarding the law. But Narayan is not so easily defeated: He pins a murder rap on Durga, who now must fight to prove his innocence and take down his brother's killer.
response.title: Satya Sarkar
